actors.name: Customer
actors.description: Places orders, gives feedback, and requests bills

actors.name: Head Chef
actors.description: Assigns dishes to chefs, marks dishes as cooked, and approves dish cancellations

actors.name: Admin
actors.description: Manages menu items, inventory, and staff

use_cases.name: Place Order
use_cases.description: The system shows a list of cards of dishes, each with a picture and price, and allows customers to select and place orders.

use_cases.name: Cancel or Edit Order
use_cases.description: The system allows customers to cancel or edit orders.

use_cases.name: Give Feedback
use_cases.description: The system provides customers with the ability to give feedback.

use_cases.name: Request Bill
use_cases.description: The system allows customers to request bills.

use_cases.name: Ask for Help
use_cases.description: The system enables customers to ask for help, notifying the hall manager of the request.
